name: Shrimp Alfredo Broccoli Bake
author: DBatesBakery
summary: This recipe gives Alfredo a seafood twist with all the simplicity of a quick casserole!
ingredients: 1 pound raw peeled and deveined shrimp, slightly thawed if frozen
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook angel hair in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, 4 to 5 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a 2-quart casserole dish with cooking spray
Cook and stir shrimp in a skillet over medium heat until slightly pink, 3 to 5 minutes
Add broccoli; cover skillet and let broccoli steam, about 5 minutes
Spread angel hair pasta over the bottom of the prepared baking dish
Pour   over shrimp and broccoli; cover sauce with Parmesan cheese
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is slightly browned, about 20 minutes
